committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises

official_title: To prohibit Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac from offering any new products during the term of any conservatorship or receivership of such enterprises.
short_title: GSE Risk and Activities Limitation Act of 2011

summary.text: GSE Risk and Activities Limitation Act of 2011 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 to prohibit the Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency from approving any new products of the Federal National Mortgage Association (Fannie Mae) or the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation (Freddie Mac) (Government-sponsored enterprises or GSEs) during any term of conservatorship or receivership.

titles.title: GSE Risk and Activities Limitation Act of 2011
To prohibit Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac from offering any new products during the term of any conservatorship or receivership of such enterprises.
